page.title: 05The Village Shop and P.O.
page.content: The present shop and Post Office have operated from one building since 1959. The shop sells such a variety of goods that it is really a mini-supermarket but with the personal touch i.e. the owner will deliver goods to your house. Daily newspapers are sold and weekly/ monthly magazines are available to order.Fresh baking is brought out daily from Wick.The shop is open every day except Sunday with a half day closing on Saturday.On Thursday it stays open until 21.30hrs.The Post Office has the same hours as the shop except for Thursday when it closes at 17.30hrs. The Post Office offers all the facilities of a Sub Post Office and has its own safety bandit screen. The shop and P.O. employ three people two full time and one part time. The shop serves a wide area.
